sentences.english: Then you truly are a fool, Prince Frog.
sentences.chinese: 那你就着實是個傻瓜，青蛙王子。

sentences.english: It's even been suggested that it could replace many dedicated point-and-shoot cameras.
sentences.chinese: 甚至還有人說，它可以取代許多專業的傻瓜相機。

sentences.english: Great minds think alike, but fools seldom differ.
sentences.chinese: 英雄所見略同，傻瓜很少意見不合。

sentences.english: He's a real klutz and will probably step on your feet!
sentences.chinese: 他是個傻瓜，而且可能會踩你的腳的。

sentences.english: I pity the fool who's illogic.
sentences.chinese: 我同情那些沒有邏輯的傻瓜。

sentences.english: No man but a blockhead ever wrote except for money.
sentences.chinese: 除非是傻瓜，從未有人爲金錢以外的東西寫文章。

sentences.english: There is even a Nostradamus For Dummies.
sentences.chinese: 甚至還有一本諾查丹瑪斯傻瓜書。

sentences.english: She is a great fool for going away, if she liked him.
sentences.chinese: 要是她喜歡他而又走開，那真是個大傻瓜呢。

sentences.english: We do not dare ask questions because we are afraid we might be called silly.
sentences.chinese: 我們因爲害怕被叫做傻瓜而不敢問問題。
它使你看起來像傻瓜似的。

sentences.english: Only stupidest cry and fools die .
sentences.chinese: 只有傻瓜蠢蛋纔會哭着喊着要去死。

sentences.english: Suspended from school; and scared to go home, I was a fool.
sentences.chinese: 我被留校查看，害怕回家，我是個傻瓜。

sentences.english: Only a fool would have gone overboard as I did.
sentences.chinese: 只有傻瓜纔會像我一樣從船上跳下來。

sentences.english: Only a fool will believe your cajolery.
sentences.chinese: 只有傻瓜纔會相信你那花言巧語的欺騙。

sentences.english: ‘You are an idiot, ’ he tells them.
Why do I waste my time with poseurs and fools ?
sentences.chinese: 我爲什麼浪費我的與僞裝者和傻瓜的時間？
